title: Anoj Khadka
text: Hi, I am Anoj and have special interest in physics, applied mathematics and computing. Besides academia, I love to walk though the wilderness and explore nature. Don’t ask me if I am interested in music, it is in my blood. In this personal website of mine I will write on topics of my above mentioned interests.

title: Anoj Khadka
text:
Just like the music is written and understood by musicians in a coded language, what is the language with which natural laws are written. Physicists claim - it is laws of phsyics condensed as an elegant matematical equations that is the language by which nature speaks. Why would nature chose to speak in such a difficult language of mathematics? Or, is it that nature speaks in many different languages, it’s only upto the observer to understand it. These are the philosophical questions I love to ruminate about.
Interests: Hiking, Travelling, Scientific Computing, Inquiring why things are the way they are.
